page.title: 05FARMING cont.
page.content: and he has to rise early in the morning. Sunday is the farmer's day of rest.Do not be mistaken the farmer still does a lot of work,but not as much as the weekly work.The cows are still milked early and the animals are counted but the smaller chores are left until Monday,unless it is really urgent. On Sunday the farmer relaxes after his dinner and sits down to watch T.V. or often goes to his bed for a while or maybe goes into town if there is anything on.Some Sundays farmer's are disturbed from their routine during the time of cows calving because delivering the calf cannot be put off to Monday.
